about_the_game: Between the chaos and the crowd, you will learn how to act before time determines your destiny in this time-based turn JRPG.
detailed_description: Between the chaos and the crowd, you will learn how to act before time determines your destiny in this time-based turn JRPG.
name: Gunkan Zero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
